name: Star Wars Pinball (itch)
description:
A small 2D, physics based Star Wars themed pinball game. Built for Windows in Unity as a student project over several weeks, this is my first game built in Unity.  

Aim for a high score by hitting the TIE Fighter and X-Wing, and see if you can activate all seven Death Star superlaser nodes to fire on the rebels!

Please feel free to leave feedback here or on Facebook at Dr Ninja and let me know what you liked, didn't like etc. 

Of course all Star Wars logos, images etc are the property of Disney.

Enjoy!
